sect1.title: General
sect1.para: General information of SOME/IP protocol can be found in the SOME/IP Protocol Specification AUTOSAR Release

Cdd_SOMEIP module is the wrapper written on top of the BSW to facilitate communication between application and the BSW through callback funtions. This module also fills the SOME/IP header to transmit data to other ECUs. In the BSW, Socket Adapter and Service Discovery configure the ethernet module to establish communication between Chorus and other ECUs fulfilling the system manifest and DFL shared by the customer.
Sd, SoAd, EcuC and LdCom are configured using EB Tresos. BswM is configured in CESSAR-CT.
